mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fd_house
order by ${orderByClause}

select h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall,h.room,h.title, h.house_detail, h.address, h.property_rights, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id,h.facilities,r1.region_name as 'area',r2.region_name as 'district',r3.region_name as 'city' from fd_house h left join fd_region r1 on h.region_id = r1.id left join fd_region r2 on r1.parent_reg_id=r2.id left join fd_region r3 on r2.parent_reg_id=r3.id where h.id=#{id}

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.property_rights, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, h.title, h.facilities, u.username AS 'owner', r.region_name AS 'area' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_user u ON h.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r ON h.region_id = r.id

select h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall,h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.property_rights, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id,r1.region_name as 'area',r2.region_name as 'district',r3.region_name as 'city' ,u.username as 'owner' from fd_house h left join fd_region r1 on h.region_id = r1.id left join fd_region r2 on r1.parent_reg_id=r2.id left join fd_region r3 on r2.parent_reg_id=r3.id left join fd_user u on h.owner_id=u.id where r1.region_name like "%"#{key}"%" or r2.region_name like "%"#{key}"%" or r3.region_name like "%"#{key}"%" or h.house_detail like "%"#{key}"%" or h.address like "%"#{key}"%"

select h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall,h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.property_rights, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id,r1.region_name as 'area',r2.region_name as 'district',r3.region_name as 'city' from fd_house h left join fd_region r1 on h.region_id = r1.id left join fd_region r2 on r1.parent_reg_id=r2.id left join fd_region r3 on r2.parent_reg_id=r3.id where r3.id=#{regionId} limit 0,#{top};

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.property_rights, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, r1.region_name AS 'area', r2.region_name AS 'district' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_region r1 ON h.region_id = r1.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r2 ON r1.parent_reg_id = r2.id WHERE r2.region_name = #{district}
